thread.title: PREVIEW: The Jungle Book Kids, The Cort Theatre, Fareham
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: The Jungle Book Kids, The Cort Theatre, Fareham

title: PREVIEW: The Jungle Book Kids, The Cort Theatre, Fareham
text:
0 comments 
NEXT week Fareham Musical Society Youth Theatre are bringing to the stage one of Disney’s most loved classics… 
The jungle is jumpin’ with jazz is this exciting Disney classic! Join Mowgli, Baloo, King Louie and the gang as they swing their way through madcap adventures and thwart the ferocious tiger, Shere Khan. Specially adapted from the beloved film, this musical includes all your favourite Disney tunes, like The Bare Necessities, and I Wan’na Be Like You. With colourful characters and that toe-tapping jungle rhythm, The Jungle Book KIDS is sure to have you tapping your feet along to the jungle beat! Share article 
When the film was released in 1967, this was the last film that Walt Disney himself worked on as he sadly passed away during the films making in 1966. 
From Thursday October 29 – Saturday October 31(7.30pm evenings and a Saturday Matinee at 2.30pm), Fareham Musical Society Youth Theatre will be presenting their first full scale musical production at The Cort Theatre, Henry Cort Community College in Fareham. The Youth Theatre launched in April and now has 41 members who have been rehearsing for the last 4 months to bring to life one of Disney’s most popular stories. If you would like to order any tickets for this production please email fmsyouththeatre@yahoo.co.uk Promoted Stories PREVIEW: The Jungle Book Kids, The Cort Theatre, Fareham Sorry, an error occurred.
